value.query: Select Id, AccountId, Account.Situs_State_Abbrev__c, Opportunity.RecordTypeName__c,OpportunityId, Opportunity.CloseDate,Name,UserGroup__c, AnthemEntityTransform__c,GroupNumber__c, DivisionName__c, GroupNumber__r.Name, IsGroupNumberExist__c, GroupNumber__r.ClaimServiceCenter__c, GroupNumber__r.CallServiceCenter__c, GroupNumber__r.DeliveryChannel__c,GroupNumber__r.Date_Migrated_to_WGS__c,GroupNumber__r.IsPartOfAMigration__c, GroupNumber__r.ClaimSystem__c, TotalSubscribers__c, TotalMembers__c, Opportunity.Probability, 	LG_Plan_Config_Exception__c,LoggedInUserProfile__c, IsGNExist__c, Is_GRS_Profile_With_Correct_Record_Type__c From Quote Where OpportunityId = '{{params.id}}' Order By CreatedDate Desc
